Class ReadCorrector

  • java.lang.Object
    • ReadCorrector

  • public class ReadCorrector
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for error correction of DNAString reads.

    All error correction methods are variations of spectral alignment.

    (1) Majority Alignment Correction (MAC) - correction by majority vote (2) Consensus Alignment Correction (CAC) - like MAC, but relying on unanimous consensus (3) Spectral Alignment Correction (SAC) - basic spectral alignment (4) Best Replacement - correct most likely error.

    Created by tohei on 6/26/17.

      • computeMAC

        public int computeMAC(boolean verbose)
        (M)ajority (A)lignment (C)orrection.

        Every k-mer in a read 'votes' for a replacement of itself by its best Hamming neighbor. The vote is weighted by the coverage of that k-mer. Every base is replaced by the majority candidate of the respective best Hamming neighbors of all overlapping k-mers. k-mers.

        Parameters:
        verbose - be verbose.
        Returns:
        the number of corrected reads.

      • computeCAC

        public int computeCAC(boolean verbose)
        (C)onsensus (A)lignment (C)orrection.

        Every k-mer in a read 'votes' for a replacement of itself by its best Hamming neighbor. A base is replaced, if all overlapping k-mers agree on that base. k-mers.

        Parameters:
        verbose - be verbose.
        Returns:
        the number of corrected reads.

      • computeSAC

        public int computeSAC(boolean verbose)
        (S)ectral (A)lignment (C)orrection.

        Low coverage kmers will be replaced by their best Hamming neighbor.

        Parameters:
        verbose - be verbose.
        Returns:
        number of replacements made.
